name: Blue Ice Akila Hammer Ice Axe
description: Light enough to not weigh you down, with enough technical punch for short ice cruxes or couloirs. The Akila is great for winters that involve skimo and alpine adventures. The chromoly steel head resists wear and provides good penetration.One-piece chomoly steel head.Sandblasted curved aluminum shaft with a textured grip.Sliding pommel is adjustable for varying terrain.Includes pick and spike protectors.
